013package org.apache.juneau;
014
015import java.util.*;
016
017import org.apache.juneau.annotation.*;
018
019/**
020 * Same as {@link BeanMeta}, except the list of bean properties are limited by a  {@link Beanp#properties() @Beanp(properties)} annotation.
021 *
022 * <ul class='seealso'>
023
024 * </ul>
025 *
026 * @param <T> The class type that this metadata applies to.
027 */
028public final class BeanMetaFiltered<T> extends BeanMeta<T> {
029
030   /**
031    * Wrapper constructor.
032    *
033    * @param innerMeta The untransformed bean meta of the bean property.
034    * @param pNames The list of transformed property names.
035    */
036   public BeanMetaFiltered(BeanMeta<T> innerMeta, String[] pNames) {
037      super(innerMeta.classMeta, innerMeta.ctx, innerMeta.beanFilter, pNames, null);
038   }
039
040   /**
041    * Wrapper constructor.
042    *
043    * @param innerMeta The untransformed bean meta of the bean property.
044    * @param pNames The list of transformed property names.
045    */
046   public BeanMetaFiltered(BeanMeta<T> innerMeta, Collection<String> pNames) {
047      this(innerMeta, pNames.toArray(new String[pNames.size()]));
048   }
049}
